name: Ferndale_Espresso_Storage_Bookcase_with_Two_Adjustable_Shelves
reviews: It is made in China, the color is not Espresso it is a dark Mahogany color from what I got. A dark brown with a red-violet touch to it.

We bought this piece for the corner of our living room to fit under a side window by the fireplace. It is a great size, looks good, and was easy to assemble. Shelves are adjustable, which is a nice option. Overall very happy with the purchase and would recommend to others.
four areas to store books and other items. Im using it to display books and china in my living room. My husband put it together quickly. Arrived in one box. Im happy with it.
I use this in a little nook in my kitchen. It is perfect!
description:
This bookcase will meet your storage needs for books, magazine and display items, finished in a very versatile espresso color. Two adjustable cube-shelves highlight this case, coupled with two fixed shelves.
Includes: One (1) bookcaseMaterials: Poplar, okume veneer, MDF, particle boardFinish: EspressoShelves: Two (2) adjustable, two (2) fixedShelf weight capacity: 25 pounds Care instructions: Wipe clean with a dry clothShelf dimensions: 12.75 inches long x 11.25 inches wideDimensions: 36 inches high x 32 inches wide x 13 inches deepStyleTransitionalMaterialMDF, Veneer, WoodFinishEspresso FinishShelf TypeBookshelves, Display, StorageAssemblyAssembly RequiredColorBrownNumber of Shelf4Product FeaturesAdjustable Shelving
